Sentencas: When connected in small amounts, the impact of distributed generation (DG) on distribution system stability will be negligible.
Titulo: Effect of a SOFC plant on distribution system stability

Sentencas: However, if its penetration level becomes higher, distributed generation may start to influence the dynamic behavior of the system as a whole.
Titulo: Effect of a SOFC plant on distribution system stability

Sentencas: This paper presents a mathematical representation of a solid oxide fuel cell plant that is suitable for use in distribution system stability studies.
Titulo: Effect of a SOFC plant on distribution system stability

Sentencas: The model is applied to a distributed utility grid that uses a solid oxide fuel cell plant as distributed resource.
Titulo: Effect of a SOFC plant on distribution system stability

Sentencas: Examinations include transient stability and voltage stability of the system.
Titulo: Effect of a SOFC plant on distribution system stability
